==== Notes ====
===== Wrong screen resolution =====
After successful installation of the system the screen is set to XGA (1024x768) resolution. To fix that we need to reconfigure xserver using dpkg-reconfigure:
<pre>
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
</pre>

===== External monitor =====
With default xserver configuration the picture on external monitor is shifted and wavy. Situation changes a bit (picture stops waving) when we connect external monitor before starting the system.
